get.description:
Returns a list of [companies](https://docs.codat.io/docs/core-companies)

You can use the `query` and `orderBy` parameters to [filter](https://docs.codat.io/docs/querying-1) and [sort](https://docs.codat.io/docs/ordering-results-1) the results.

404.description: No companies match your search term

post.description: Create a [company](https://docs.codat.io/docs/core-companies)

requestBody.description:
Details of the company you wish to create.
If you specify a 'platformType', the company will be created with a data connection to that platform.

400.description: Invalid request body; see validation for more information.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The ID of the company to update

delete.description: Delete a [company](https://docs.codat.io/docs/core-companies).  This is not reversible.

get.description: Returns a single [company](https://docs.codat.io/docs/core-companies) by ID

Returns a list of [connections](https://docs.codat.io/docs/core-dataconnections)

You can use the `query` and `orderBy` parameters to [filter](https://docs.codat.io/docs/querying-1) and [sort](https://docs.codat.io/docs/ordering-results-1) the results.

post.description: Create a [connection](https://docs.codat.io/docs/core-dataconnections)

get.description: Returns a single [connection](https://docs.codat.io/docs/core-dataconnections) by ID

delete.description: Delete a [connection](https://docs.codat.io/docs/core-dataconnections).  This is not reversible.

patch.summary: Disconnect a data source from a company
patch.description:
This revokes a company’s access to a data source, but the data connection is still listed as a part of a company's
data connection(s). The status value in the request body should be "Unlinked" (case sensitive). Data connections
can only be unlinked if in the Linked or Deauthorized state.

post.summary: Initiates the process of capturing a new data snapshot for a company
post.description: Initiates the synchronisation for all possible data types supported by the linked data sources

post.summary: Initiates the process of capturing a data snapshot of a specified type for a company
post.description: Initiates the synchronisation for a specified data type

get.summary: Fetch a list of all data snapshots captured for a company
Fetch metadata on a single data synchronisation
Get the status for each datatype
get.description: Gets the current status for each datatype the given company has synced

get.summary: Gets all available push options for the given data type
Gets the POST push options for the given data type
Gets the PUT push options for the given data type
Gets the push options for the given data type
Gets a single push operation record
Gets a list of all the Codat standard categories.
Get account categories (suggested and confirmed) for a company connection.

patch.summary: Updates the categories for all or a batch of accounts for a specific connection.

get.summary: Gets the suggested and/or confirmed category for a specific account.

patch.summary: Updates or removes the confirmed category of a specific account.

get.summary: Gets match status for a given company and datatype.
Gets match summary for a given company and datatype, optionally restricted by a Codat query string.
Gets record-by-record match results for a given company and datatype, optionally restricted by a Codat query string.
Gets all the available financial metrics for a given company, over one or more periods.
Gets a fully categorized profit and loss statement for a given company, over one or more period(s).
Gets a fully categorized balance sheet statement for a given company, over one or more period(s).
Gets the revenue and revenue growth for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the order information for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the refunds information for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the customer retention metrics for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the lifetime value metric for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the marketing metrics from an accounting source for a given company, over one or more periods of time.
Gets key metrics for subscription revenue.

get.description:
Company settings can be used to override the integration-level settings for whether Codat's desktop connectors are installed for ongoing synchronisations or whether a one-time sync is performed and the connector is uninstalled.
See [On-prem connector setup](https://docs.codat.io/docs/offline-connectors) for more information.

put.description:
Company settings can be used to override the integration-level settings for whether Codat's desktop connectors are installed for ongoing synchronisations or whether a one-time sync is performed and the connector is uninstalled.
See [On-prem connector setup](https://docs.codat.io/docs/offline-connectors) for more information.

get.description:

See [configure synchronisation settings](https://docs.codat.io/docs/data-sync-settings) for more information.
